title: Can't login into game client takes forever for authentication (MAC)
body:
Hey guys, 

Ever since patch 7.20 and the one before i can not log in to the game anymore. It is loading forever and in the rare case that i can get through the client it will show me the text that i am not connected to the servers and that they are trying to reconnect which usually ends with me being kicked out of the game. Ive tried the given solutions by riot but no of them worked 

some help would ne nice

replies.body:
Hey, sorry this has been happening since the batch and I'd like to help.  In cases like this, your network might be struggling to reach our services like the authentication server but there are some steps to clear up any snags.  I'm not sure which solutions you've tried, but I personally recommend the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.

See if the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) can help as well with firewall settings.

Let me know if this helps.

Hey there, I've tried the repair tool, checked my firewall settings, and everything else. I've also scrubbed the internet for answers and still haven't found a solution that fixes this issue. even when I do manage to log in, I'm greeted with this in-client popup window that never manages to reconnect me: https://s1.postimg.org/24tj0hyfr3/Screen_Shot_2017-10-23_at_5.45.18_PM.png

 I don't believe my wifi or internet settings are the issue since I've tried connecting from multiple sources through my Macbook Laptop. SOS please send help
i have a ton of issues on mac since the patch, including low fps and high ping.... = /
